remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在于集合中，返回。If the exists in the collection, it is returned. 如果的集合中不存在给定，则发生以下操作：If the does not exist in the collection for a given , the following happens: |MissingMappingActionMissingMappingAction|执行操作Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|创建对象与给定`sourceTable`作为源表名称和`dataSetTable`作为表名称。Creates a object with the given `sourceTable` as the source table name and `dataSetTable` as the table name. 创建对象不会添加到集合。The created object is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|生成异常。An exception is generated. `dataSetTable`参数将被忽略。The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.| |`Ignore`|获取 `null`。Gets `null`. `dataSetTable`参数将被忽略。The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.| ## Examples 下面的示例搜索在集合内使用给定的源表名称。The following example searches for a with the given source table name within the collection. 如果该对象存在，则返回它。If the object exists, it is returned. 该示例假定集合和一个对象已创建。The example assumes that a collection and a object have been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
